name: Invoke-Obfuscation CLIP+ Launcher
description: Detects Obfuscated use of Clip.exe to execute PowerShell
query: (winlog.channel:System AND winlog.provider_name:/[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee]\ [Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll]\ [Mm][Aa][Nn][Aa][Gg][Ee][Rr]/ AND event.code:7045 AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:/.*[Cc][Mm][Dd].*/ AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:/.*[Cc][Ll][Ii][Pp].*/ AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:/.*[Cc][Ll][Ii][Pp][Bb][Oo][Aa][Rr][Dd]\]\:\:.*/)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:System AND winlog.provider_name:Service\ Control\ Manager AND event.code:7045 AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:*cmd* AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:*clip* AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:*clipboard\]\:\:*)`
